long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of time with our **Life & Goal Countdown** Chrome extension! Every new tab becomes a reminder of your life's precious moments or your next big goal, beautifully visualized.

Imagine this: each time you open a new tab, you're greeted with a dynamic countdown that brings your dreams closer or reminds you to make the most of every day. Choose between a **Lifespan Countdown**—tracking the years, months, days, and seconds of your life with a motivational message—or a **Goal Deadline** to count down the days until your next milestone.

In the background, a grid-style visual tracker shows you time's progress with filled and unfilled squares, giving an inspiring snapshot of where you are and how far you've come.

This extension is more than just a clock—it’s a motivator, a productivity booster, and a gentle nudge toward purposeful living. Start each day with intent, and see your time like never before.
